content:
riksmithies pushed 2 commits to branch rik-meddef-aug.

  • removed SubstanceReferenceInformation.classification, which is being simplified and moved to SubstanceDefinition (3b92588)
  • removed SubstanceReferenceInformation.classification, which is being simplified and moved to SubstanceDefinition (8b38451)

riksmithies pushed 1 commit to branch rik-meddef-aug.

  • Swapped around the excel sheet so that of the two routes, substance.strength comes first and specifiedSubstance.strength is a clone of it, rather than the other way around. (20ebd42)

riksmithies pushed 1 commit to branch rik-meddef-aug.

riksmithies pushed 131 commits to branch rik-meddef-aug. Commits by grahamegrieve (34), GinoCanessa (19), Khalid-Shahin (18) and others (60).

  • Refined the EvidenceReport draft resource by making a few elements [x] (83fc4cc)
  • corrected issue where MedicinalProductDefinition.crossReference.product had an [x] even though it is no longer a choice (1ca3f2e)
  • Merge pull request #943 from HL7/rik-idmp-aug (4b3837d)
  • Change to the EvidenceReport draft resource elements (3b2dee1)
  • Merge pull request #944 from HL7/rik-meddef-aug (b2207bd)
  • Added contactDetail extensions to support EBM-on-FHIR resources (8ec1978)
  • Merge pull request #945 from HL7/rik-meddef-aug (80b4b06)
  • Bump (7b409bc)
  • Merge pull request #946 from HL7/brynrhodes-ebm-on-fhir-extensions (c9cca86)
  • added MedicinalProductDefinition.impurity for FHIR#27545 (7e94908)
  • Merge pull request #948 from HL7/rik-meddef-s6-aug (934aa52)
  • added SubstanceDefinition.classification (FHIR#27108) (ae0d9e0)
  • Merge pull request #949 from HL7/rik-meddef-s6-aug (1514658)
  • Update evidencereport-spreadsheet.xml (afacc68)
  • Merge pull request #942 from HL7/COKA-and-EBMonFHIR-July-30,-2020 (0c48780)
  • switch to using dicom authored valueSets rather than hand written copies J#24908 (26f1439)
  • Merge pull request #947 from HL7/rik-meddef-aug (a3c58fd)
  • use a local valueSet for audit media types to fix an issue with the EHRS IG (4c27987)
  • Merge pull request #951 from HL7/Moehrke_DICOM_ValueSets (af4f14d)
  • Merge pull request #950 from HL7/rik-meddef-aug (e4112ae)
    [and 111 more commit(s)]
